text: Fernando Cedrola de Souza (born December 27, 1986) is a Brazilian footballer currently playing for Club Aurora who signed him as a free transfer in 2011. He previously played for clubs including Benevento. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:C.D. title: Fernando Cedrola
